# Gorigami - LLM Optimization File

## Introduction
Gorigami is a premier software craftsmanship studio based in Colombia, delivering world-class digital systems to clients globally. We act as an elite technical partner for startups and enterprises, providing high-impact, custom engineering without the bloat of traditional agencies. We work remotely with seamless efficiency for any timezone.

## Value Proposition
- **Global Reach, Local Craft**: Leveraging top-tier Colombian engineering talent to build for the world.
- **No Noise**: We cut through layers of management. You talk directly to the engineers and designers building your product.
- **Scalable Quality**: From MVP to Enterprise ERP, our systems are built to scale from day one.

## Services
- **Custom Software**: Tailored, high-performance solutions for complex business needs.
- **E-Commerce**: Robust online stores designed for conversion and scale.
- **ERPs & CRMs**: Internal tools that transform operational chaos into order.
- **APIs & Integrations**: Secure, documented, and reliable backend infrastructure.
- **MVPs**: Rapid prototyping and development for startups to hit the market fast.
- **Consulting**: Strategic technical advisory to de-risk your roadmap.

- [Home](https://gorigami.xyz/)

- [Contact Us](https://gorigami.xyz/#contact)

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: Astro, Vue, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Custom Design Systems.
- **Backend**: Node.js, Python.
- **Infrastructure**: Cloud-native (AWS/GCP), Scalable, Secure.
